name: pgn4-converter
description: Convert PGN4 format to standard PGN using ffishjs

scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p lib && cp node_modules/ffish-es6/ffish.js lib/ && cp node_modules/ffish-es6/ffish.wasm .
scripts.build: npm run copy-assets && echo 'Static site ready for deployment'
